author: Jim Axelrod
title: How troubling times have brought out creative performers
description: Performers are not letting the need to stay apart keep them from creating soul-soothing sounds together.
content:
Montclair, New Jersey — Half the world's population is now under orders to stay home during the coronavirus pandemic. That's a hardship for many — but for some, it's an opportunity to show off their talents to a global audience. 
In New Zealand, Jack Buchana… [+2004 chars]
